poll_info.title: NuggMD Cannabis Consumer Poll - Harris as Democratic Nominee Impact
poll_info.methodology: Digital questionnaire sent to verified, representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets

questions.question_text: Kamala Harris is now the presumptive Democratic presidential nominee after Joe Biden dropped out. How has this impacted your views on November's election?

demographics.population: Representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets
demographics.sample_method: Sourced from independent providers of verified consumer data and first-party data
demographics.verification: Cannabis consumers who are likely/committed voters. A strong majority of the sample reports daily or weekly cannabis use.
